Talked about Bill with my class of @YoungRWCMD students only last week. Urged them to read A Sense Of Direction. Unique & uncompromising.

So proud to say I was taught by Bill. 30 years ago but I have thought about his teaching nearly every day since.

@Arts_Wales_ #investmentreview implies radical change may be required even of companies that have retained their revenue status. Hope so.
Given the lack of any significant change in numbers, it looks like the national companies are going to have to take the brunt of the cuts.
Very sad to see @earthfall lose its revenue funding in @Arts_Wales_ #investmentreview
Can't bear guff about "winners and losers" in commentary on today's @Arts_Wales_ #investmentreview announcement. It's not a competition.
